title: The History of Apple's Easy-Open Feature (Apple II and Macintosh Products)
tags: The History of Apple's Easy-Open Feature (Apple II and Macintosh Products)
description: Today, we'll look at the history of Apple's "easy-open" feature; Apple products, especially Macs, used to be simple to open. We'll talk about the Apple IIe Enhanced, and time-travel all the way to the 2013 Mac Pro.  Get more vintage Apple tech!   Dont miss future tech videos!
